SELECT *
FROM BF_CMN_RSC_CODE
AND RSC_CD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{rscCdName}||'%'
AND RSC_CD_CLFY = #{rscCdClfy}
ORDER BY RSC_CD_CODE DESC

SELECT STOCK.RSC_LOT_NO, STOCK.RSC_STOCK_ST, STOCK.RSC_STOCK, STOCK.RSC_CD_CODE,
CODE.RSC_CD_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_STOCK STOCK LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE CODE ON STOCK.RSC_CD_CODE = CODE.RSC_CD_CODE
STOCK.RSC_CD_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rscCdCode}||'%'
AND CODE.RSC_CD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{rscCdName}||'%'
ORDER BY RSC_LOT_NO DESC

SELECT OD.*, RSC_ORDER_ST
FROM BF_RSC_ORDER OD JOIN (SELECT RSC_ORDER_CODE, SUM(RSC_ORDER_ST) AS RSC_ORDER_ST FROM BF_RSC_ORDER_DETAILS GROUP BY RSC_ORDER_CODE) SM ON OD.RSC_ORDER_CODE = SM.RSC_ORDER_CODE
RSC_ORDER_ST = 0
AND RSC_ORDER_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{rscOrderTitle} ||'%'
AND RSC_ORDER_DATE = #{rscOrderDate}
ORDER BY 1

SELECT RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE, NVL(RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE,''), RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE, RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_VOL,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME,
VEND.VEND_CD_NM,
EMP.EMP_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_OUT RSCOUT LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON RSCOUT.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON RSCOUT.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON RSCOUT.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
WHERE RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CLS = 2
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rscOutCode}||'%'
AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{rscOutDate}) AND RSCOUT.RSC_OUT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{rscOutDate}) +1
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT RTN.RSC_RETURN_CODE, RTN.RSC_RETURN_DATE, RTN.RSC_RETURN_VOL,
NVL(VEND.VEND_CD_NM,' '),
RSC.RSC_CD_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_RETURN RTN LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON RTN.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSC ON RTN.RSC_CD_CODE = RSC.RSC_CD_CODE
AND RTN.RSC_RETURN_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rscReturnCode}||'%'
AND RTN.RSC_RETURN_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{rscReturnDate}) AND RTN.RSC_RETURN_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{rscReturnDate}) +1
ORDER BY 1;
